pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"使用如下命令替换为本镜像："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"mkdir -p /etc/xbps.d
cp /usr/share/xbps.d/*-repository-*.conf /etc/xbps.d/
sed -i 's|https://repo-default.voidlinux.org|{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}|g' /etc/xbps.d/*-repository-*.conf","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"若报错可尝试"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"sed -i 's|https://alpha.de.repo.voidlinux.org|{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}|g' /etc/xbps.d/*-repository-*.conf","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["之后可用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"xbps-query -L"}]," 检查是否正确替换。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["参考",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://docs.voidlinux.org/xbps/repositories/mirrors/changing.html","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方教程"}],"。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Void Linux 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
